name: The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson
description: The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson is a TV series starring Craig Ferguson, Shadoe Stevens, and Josh Robert Thompson. Making a satire out of the entire Late Night Show concept Scotsman Craig Ferguson hosts his show with a robot...

review.name: I have a new favourite talk show host...
review.reviewBody: I used to watch The Late Late Show with Craig Kilbourne now and then, and found it enjoyable. Now, I actually try NOT to miss it, because I love Craig Ferguson. I find him to be charming, interesting, witty, intelligent, down-to-earth, and....well, just darn HANDSOME. I didn't watch the Drew Carey Show more than a handful of times, and I hadn't heard of Craig until the Late Late Show started up again. The Scot in me finds him especially intriguing. In some ways he's like a younger version of my father, which, if you know him, is a huge compliment. Scotsmen rock! I just love how REAL Craig is - he's casually mentioned things of his past, positives and negatives, without making it into a "woe is me" or "I'm the best" type of thing. He also seems like a wonderful, fun father to his little boy. The Late Late Show is definitely something I'll be faithfully watching! Some talk shows I only watch depending on the GUESTS that will be on; this one I actually watch for the host! Craig Ferguson - keep up the great work.

trailer.name: The Late Late Show With Craig Ferguson
